#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
#define SIZE 1000001
#define gc() getchar_unlocked()
#define pc(x) putchar_unlocked(x)
/*static inline int fastio()
{
    int x=0;
    char c=gc();
    while(c<'0'||c>'9')
    {
        c=gc();
    }
    while(c>='0'&&c<='9')
    {
        x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-'0';
        c=gc();
    }
    return x;
}
 
static inline void fastWrite(int x)
{
 
  char s[25];
  int i=0;
  do
  {
      s[i++]=x%10+'0';
      x/=10;
  }while(x);
  --i;
  while(i>=0)
  {
      pc(s[i--]);
  }
  pc('\n');
 
} */
 
 
 
 
int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0);
    //int T;
    string s;
    cin>>s;
    int d=s[s.size()-1]-'0';
    if(d&1)
        cout<<"NO"<<endl;
    else
        cout<<"YES"<<endl;
    return 0;
}
